tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Sacrifice For Royalty
programme.desc: Nneka sacrifice her education for her man, Prince Gozie, this love makes him promise her marriage. Will he keep to that promise?

programme.title: Love Unbound
programme.desc: With her daughter adding to her troubles and Mmasi making strides in his life, Helen grapples with the weight of her past actions while her future hangs precariously in the balance.

programme.title: The Palace Gate
programme.desc: A king pleads with Okoye, the gatekeeper not to abandon his post, gripped by the fear of losing everything, as his daughter, Kamsi, brings turmoil to the kingdom and threatens his throne.

programme.title: Veiled Destiny
programme.desc: Nkemdilim rejects five suitors all because of her decision to become a reverend sister, but Chukwudubem will not give up as he feels that she is under a spiritual spell.

programme.title: Entangled Truth
programme.desc: Nze and Samantha, once deeply in love are separated by lifes challenges. Despite this, Nze remained loyal to her. But the worse is yet to happen.

programme.title: Ghetto Lord
programme.desc: Ashana and his mom Ogbolu terrorize the entire community. Now that theres a new sheriff in town, the ghetto lords will have to bow.

programme.title: Flaws
programme.desc: Emma and his friends are having a lot of drama in their marriages, but all is about to change as Emma devises a means to bring peace to his home by cheating on his wife.

programme.title: Akugbe
programme.desc: Odiase wins a wrestling contest and the king bless him bountifully with a land, including handing him his sister. Will it change Odiase?

programme.title: First Wife
programme.desc: The hate mama has for her twin sister Martha is overwhelming. She stands in for her and accepts her bride price, now she is hell bent on marrying her sisters husband.

programme.title: Bachelor Life
programme.desc: Emeka and Nwakaego live a fake life, deceiving each other in love, but the truth is about to come to the open as things start falling apart.

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: A young man get his fathers wife pregnant, and they both keep it a secret just to take all his inheritance.

programme.title: The Dynasty
programme.desc: Obi swears never to forgive his father when he lost his mom 15 years ago, now he must look away from the past and save his father from the clutching arms of Mariam.

programme.title: Ant Infested Firewood
programme.desc: Obinna breaks his wifes heart when he throws her and their daughters out because of another woman, Ifeoma. He gets her pregnant and the manipulation begins.

programme.title: Exchange For Love
programme.desc: Amadi the Onowu of a kingdom will do anything to ascend the throne, even if it means killing the crowned prince. But the princes goodwill is about to save him from the disaster ahead.

programme.title: Ugomma
programme.desc: Amadi falls in love with an herbalist daughter, but everything is about to change as he has to visit the evil forest to get herbs for Ugommas father to stay alive.

programme.title: Smoke And Mirrors
programme.desc: Rooted in culture, AfricaMagic Epic is a channel dedicated to African programming made by Africans and features the best of epic entertainment content from the continent.

programme.title: The Dead Mans Name
programme.desc: In a village, the tradition dictates that once a woman loses her husband, she cannot marry another man. Yolan is bound by this custom, destined to remain unmarried until her death.

programme.title: Twin Disaster
programme.desc: Wendy selflessly offers to surrogate for her twin, Linda, to help her start a family. However, Wendys reproductive health suffers after carrying a child for her sister.

programme.title: Fates Scribble
programme.desc: Fresh out of jail, Dami, a single mother, embarks on a frantic quest to find her daughter, who has been sold and trafficked by the person she trusted as her guardian.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Oviyon shares some good news. Obi confronts his father. Senami brokers a deal for Akweyon.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Shandu and Stukkie say their vows in front of a happy crowd. Back in Joburg, Gazini is struggling to get a grip and Victor and Sgila are getting worried.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Obus and Donatus fight over Obuss percentage from the successful reclaim of Donatuss money.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: The day of Bhefikas installation arrives. Mandla and Bongani scheme against Sbu. Bhekifa overhears a cryptic conversation about a dark secret from his past.

programme.title: The Johnsons
programme.desc: A family sitcom that focus on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them

programme.title: Ajoche
programme.desc: Revenge, war, duty, honor, love and lust are the order of the day, as the people of Ocholuje must learn to survive when they uncover some bitter truths.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Obus turns on Mimi when she refuses to join in his fight against Dan and Donatus.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: Laide opens reel studios financial records to the fake agents. Frank is back in charge at Ziggys bar. Jesse needs help but can Brenda forgive him?

programme.title: Greed And Desire
programme.desc: Thakane puts a GPS tracking bracelet on Atleha. Mapule is relieved to learn that everything is sorted regarding Zondo. Tselane is not pleased when she learns about Marus business trip.

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Eddy tries to get fresh with Diana, Scabadah gets some answers. Ademide faces retribution.

programme.title: Brethren
programme.desc: Bulus saves Tobi from trouble. Ire refuses to indulge Kinto as he becomes obsessed with finding his scammer. Bara and Bassey find out surprising news about their latest suspect.

programme.desc: The secret affair between two lovers is exposed when the ladys colleague sends a picture of the couple making out to the blogs.

programme.title: Altered Desire
programme.desc: The young queen of Ama Kingdom falls in love with her chief palace guard amidst the killings befalling the kingdom. The guard turns out to be God sent.

programme.title: Countdown

programme.title: In the Line of Duty III
programme.desc: Two notorious thieves escape to Hong Kong after committing a jewellery heist in Japan. Madam Yeung and a Japanese inspector must team up to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey Of A Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Nui uses his boxing skills to help the weak fight villains. He accepts a death combat challenge so as to take revenge for his friend.

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, an all-female police squad encounters sexism and conflicts during training, but must band together to take down a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: At the dawn of 1997, three notorious Hong Kong thieves coincidentally meet in a restaurant, sparking rumours of a huge heist before the Handover unbeknownst to them.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily. A talented virtual car racing champion joins them to regain its glory.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Black Panther Warriors
programme.desc: Tasked with retrieving a classified file, the mercenary Black Cougar assembles a squad of elite warriors to embark on this perilous mission.

programme.title: Breaking News
programme.desc: A botched police stand-off with a gang of criminals is captured by TV cameras and broadcast live on TV, adding to the woes of the police attempting to nail these bad guys!

programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: Young Heroes Of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: Set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, a young man Chen Zhen, rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Madam Fong leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the HK Deputy Commissioner of Police.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartels turf war.

programme.title: Executioners
programme.desc: An evil deformed villain controls Hong Kongs scarce water supply, so the trio of Wonder Woman, Thief Catcher and Invisible Woman must team up and save the city.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her husband and daughter. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Two bumbling cops must retrieve a roll of film containing the criminal evidence against a drug cartel from the informants girlfriend, Rosa, to track down the gangsters.

programme.title: Colour of the Loyalty
programme.desc: A triad boss elite guards need to protect him from assassination. As one guard witnesses the elimination of other triad bosses, he unravels a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Cat And Mouse
programme.desc: Constable Zhan Zhao is constantly at loggerheads with Bai Yu Tong. Unbeknownst to Zhan, Bai is a girl subtly vying for his heart amidst their escalating conflicts.

programme.title: Once A Gangster
programme.desc: Two former gangsters are tapped to run in an election for leader of the triad gang, but both want to preserve their peaceful lives. Each must outwit the other to lose.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses martial arts skill founded by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels intending to dominate the world.

programme.title: Bruce Lee, My Brother
programme.desc: A Bruce Lees biopic told by his younger brother Robert, this movie follows Bruce Lees journey from a defiant youth in Hong Kong to his global triumph at age 18 in USA.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: In this classic martial arts comedy, Sammo Hung stars as Lam Sai Wing, the disciple of Wong Fei Hung, who gets embroiled in a feud with a rival kung fu school.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: Mei leads the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit to defeat the drug cartel in a fierce battle, and successfully rescue her undercover father who has his identity exposed.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: A special agent from the Japanese National Security teams up with a skilled thief to find a pair of plates used to make counterfeit USD.

programme.title: The Sniper
programme.desc: A police sniper teams up with a hot-headed rookie to take down his former friend and teammate who is exacting revenge on the police.

programme.title: 3AM The Campus
programme.desc: A school girl joins a horror video project filmed in an old building near her campus to take revenge on a bullying gang, even at the expense of sacrificing the innocents...

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world must return to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.desc: Lidylle entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face son entourage, fait resurgir de lourds secrets.

programme.desc: A la mort mysterieuse dun homme daffaires puissant, lepouse de lun de ses employes, son amie de frache date et son amant sont suspectes.

programme.desc: Une femme espre que sa fille deviendra une mannequin celbre et fait tout parvenir ses ambitions, mais elle sengage dans un chemin difficile.
